none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on July 16, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 The lines that separate new age from prog and schmaltz from ambient get very blurry the closer the subgenres get, but it's fine to listen to something and not know what it's supposed to be called. In fact, not knowing what you're supposed to be hearing and just hearing will probably make for a better listening experience all around. So listen to Inner Pieces, a collection of pre-1986 recordings from prolific English prog and/or new age and/or ambient outfit THE ENID. Listen to Inner Pieces, and let yourself hear. INNER PIECESReading their disclaimer, I'm struck....like, "If only that could work," you know? And also....could it?

seo.title: The Enid - Inner Pieces - Terminal Escape
